title: Berlioz - Harold en Italie - Munch (1958)
description:
- Composer: Hector Berlioz

- Work: Harlod en Italie (Harold in Italy)

- Played by: Charles Munch and the Boston Symphony Orchestra

- Record label and date: RCA (Japanese recording), 1958

- My comment: Now that's a rare CD! The sound is absolutely breathtaking for the year of recording, truly a Japanese mastering marvel! Probably my favourite version of this Romantic masterpiece. I'm sorry, the CD's cover JPG is low quality (but it matches), because I couldn't find better anywhere :(

- Tracks :
1. Harold en Italie, Op.16 - I. Harold aux montagnes : Scene de melancolie, de bonheur et de joie
2. II. Marche des pelerins, chantant la priere du soir
3. III. Serenade d'un montagnard des Abbruzes a sa Maitresse
4. IV. Orgie des brigands : Souvenirs de scenes precedents
5. Ouverture 'le carnaval romain', Op.9
6. Beatrice et Benedicte : Ouverture
7. Benvenuto Cellini : Ouverture
8. Ouverture 'Le Corsaire', Op.21
